name: Their Realm
description:
Our student project explores game tropes of 3rd person stealth, puzzle & adventure games to create a short conceptual narrative about two beings - Lešeň & Poděnka - maneuvering around hostile creatures and obstacles to change their worlds. 

Each of them play diifferently. Both have one distinct special power and face different challenges of their unique realm.

Lešeň can unfold his bag into spatial climbing frame to access areas hard to reach.

Poděnka shoots seeds of quickly growing creeper stems transporting her through jungle.

Game is currently in the first stages of development with no specific vision of release date / final scope. However, we would like to share our testable progress via short demo builds, concept arts and other thought updates. 

Your feedback is priceless in this stage (technical build / proof of concept), share your thoughts about our work in the comment sections! 

Thank you,

- Šimon Vladík (programming, game design -> https://gostikvlad.itch.io/) & Tereza Koudelková (visuals, game design ->  https://www.instagram.com/sutori.tera/)
